name: Dominopolis (NameHaver)
description:
Want a new game to play with your set of Dominoes? What if this new game added a THIRD DIMENSION?!

In Dominopolis you and up to three of your friends will work together to build a Domino tile cityscape. You'll take turns adding Domino districts to the city and investing in which districts are going to end up on top!

All you need to play is 2-4 players, 30 minutes of free time, and a Double-6 Domino set.
